title: User Workflow Sequence
content:
sequenceDiagram
    participant User
    participant System
    participant Administrator
    participant Coordinator

    User->>System: 1. Selects Agent
    activate System
    System-->>System: 2. Creates Playbook
    deactivate System

    User->>Administrator: 3. Starts Chat
    activate Administrator

    Administrator->>Coordinator: 4. Delivers Playbook & Chat Results
    deactivate Administrator
